name: Hammer Of Justice
description:
Smash the criminals with the hammer of justice and leave the innocent unharmed.

Controls : SPACE or Left click to smash

-> At the begining of each round you are given visual informations about the criminals. If any suspects matches one or more of these infos, he's a criminal.
-> You lose 1 life if you smash an innocent or let a criminal out without punishment.
-> You gain +1, +5 or +10 points respectively if the criminal you are punishing has 1, 2 or 3 of the physical attributes indicated at the begining of the round.

This game was created alone in 30 hours (WAY MORE than the 3 hours target) for the TriJam#119 and the theme was Law & Order. I used Unity and every assets were made during jam time except : 

- Music : New York Jazz Loop by FoolBoyMedia

- Game over jingle : Game_over.wav

- Wooden hammer smash : mlotek.wav

- Slot machine sound : slot maching major 9.mp3

- Flesh SFX : bone_flesh crush/ punch & Horror fleshy impale impact with remains falling

- Clang : Clang

- Law & order sound effect

Special thanks to Anna for her voice acting ✨
